Everything-depends-on-probability.title: Everything depends on probability
Everything-depends-on-probability.content:
In the world, everything depends on probability. Studying for an exam is an act of increasing the probability of getting a high score in the exam, while studying stocks is an act of increasing the probability of gaining profits in the stock market.
Â However, unexpected events like getting an upset stomach on exam day or financial crises like the mortgage crisis can also occur in the stock market.
Even with outstanding abilities, if one does not receive the blessing of probability, no matter how much effort one puts in, they may not achieve the desired results.

Learn-from-failure/01.--Prologue.title: 01. Prologue
Learn-from-failure/01.--Prologue.content:
My personal philosophy about life has been greatly influenced by Buddha. I donâ€™t know much about Buddhist teachings, but I think itâ€™s because I believe there isnâ€™t a phrase more universally applicable to the entirety of human life than â€˜life is sufferingâ€™.

The basis of life is suffering, living for fleeting moments of happiness.

The-super-verbose-me/01.-The-oldest-memo.title: 01. The first memory
The-super-verbose-me/01.-The-oldest-memo.content:
My oldest memory is of me crossing the crosswalk with my hand raised above. But thereâ€™s was a problem. When I was young, I was so foolish that I didnâ€™t know how to look at traffic lights. I thought I could just cross with my hand raised, so I almost got into a traffic accident.
Â As was common in Korea in the 1990s, from around the age of five or six, I wandered around the neighborhood by myself. It was in Ahyeon 1-dong, Mapo-gu, Seoul.
